entry.name: removableDevices
entry.label: If true it lists removable devices, such as USB thumbdrives. Only one between removableDevices, nonRemovableDevices and allDevices should be set.

entry.name: nonRemovableDevices
entry.label: If true it lists non removable devices, such as internal harddrives. Only one between removableDevices, nonRemovableDevices and allDevices should be set.

entry.name: allDevices
entry.label: If true it lists all kind of devices. Only one between removableDevices, nonRemovableDevices and allDevices should be set.

entry.name: popupOnNewDevice
entry.label: If true it tries to open the plasmoid when a new device is inserted, as a kind of notification.
